name: Spelling Bee Finals
description: Congratulations to our finalists for earning a spot in the next round! Come out and cheer them on at the Los Alamitos Spelling Bee.

description: The PTA is hosting author Shawn Harris for an assembly for our students on January 27th for the release of his book Let's Be Bees.
